## NodeImageData class

A Node implementation of DOM ImageData.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NodeImageData implements IImageData 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(width, height, data)](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagedata._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>NodeImageData</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [data](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagedata.data.md) |  | <code>Uint8ClampedArray</code> | The actual RGB32 image data. The length of the data is width \* height \* 4 (bytes per pixel). |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagedata.height.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The height of the image data in pixels. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.nodeimagedata.width.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The width of the image data in pixels. |
